thread.section_title: The Nadler Victoria - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location. Clean new rooms
thread.title_full: Great location. Clean new rooms - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Burt B
title: Great location. Clean new rooms
text: The staff here is great. Very polite and helpful. We have stayed in Hotels in the U.K. On numerous occasions and this is the best we have stayed at. Pricing is reasonable for what you get and the location is very Central. Will be back. Has a kitchenette with coffee maker refrigerator and micro
